name: Need for Speed: Porsche Unleashed

game.exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Electronic Arts/Need For Speed - Porsche Unleashed Demo/Porsche.exe

content:
files:
- demo: https://archive.org/download/NeedForSpeedPorscheUnleashedDemo/Porsche.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Electronic Arts/Need For Speed - Porsche Unleashed
    Demo/Porsche.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/nfsdemo
    file: demo
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: $CACHE/nfsdemo/Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
